text: Hagi kagrama hate'ma vunaku'ma hananke'za, kagri vahe'mo'za amne zamagra'a oti'za kagrane vanageta ha' vahe'enena hara ome hugahaze. Ruotage'ma hu'nea agonafima kenage ata komo'ma, trazante runtegeno kasefa hankavema ete eriaza hunka, maka zupa hankaveka'amo'a kasefa hugahie. (Hibru 5:6, 6:20, 7:17-21.)
